text:
Faulting application httpd.exe, version 2.2.11.0, time stamp 0x493f5d44, faulting module libapr-1.dll,


version 1.3.3.0, time stamp 0x4a0b673e, exception code 0x40000015, fault offset 0x00007fe9, process id 0xe4, application start time 0x


Apache httpd server is craching and restarting automatically. This has become frequent and bringing down the production.


Background:

We recently upgraded subversion from 1.6.2 to 1.6.4 as both were compiled against the same apache version we did not update to latest apache version 2.2.13



This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way.
Please contact the application's support team for more information.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.


Thanks
Ravi.
creator: ravi.venkatasubbaiah@fnis.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Looking for a backtrace from Dr. Watson or WinDbg, I don't see one.

If you are able to provide us the necessary information we would be happy
to take a look.

http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html#backtrace-win

Given that in your configuration subversion had changed and httpd had not, 
I know which I would first suspect ;-P
